title: Alan Watt - Cutting Through The Matrix - Week.8
description:
In all ages, in all lands, there have been those who seek truth. This seeking
is an individual\&#039;s search for something more than self, and much more than the
confines of this worldly system. It is the seeker, who understands there is more
than what meets the eye, who is not afraid and makes the choice to go into the
unknown. The process of awaking has begun, the discovery is underway.

2008 - Alan Watt - A Course in Deprogramming


Alan Watt, a leading researcher into hidden history, ancient civilizations,
and their influence on modern society, speaks on the global agenda of the
ruling elite, the open conspiracy, the old world order made new, the temporary
police state leading to the chip implant, and much more.

Alan Watt\&#039;s interviews on CuttingThroughTheMatrix are absolutely priceless.
His broadcasts are in a class of their own. In a world full of clones, his powerfully
original presentation and unique message undoubtedly makes him a target.
 <a href="
http://www.cuttingthroughthematrix.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.cuttingthroughthematrix.com/</a>



This Week:

1. Governance by Conology and Coercive Perception Validation.

2. Helmets for Hell-Mutts. No Pain Game for Interfacing Your Brain.

3. Hour1 Follow the Leader and the Sheeple Mentality.
4. Hour2 Follow the Leader and the Sheeple Mentality.

5. Tattooed Telephone for Compulsive Tattlers.



ID3 Tagged by HueMann
